subs.text: This is still a good idea for the news industry to collaborate on. Sometimes a news org takes down the paywall on a story because it's important that everyone see it. Make an RSS feed that combines all such stories across all pubs. Make spreading the news even more efficient.
Should I watch the second episode of that vacuous ripoff of Game of Thrones the one with all the fake characters?
If you want to understand Trump just ask Stevie Van Zandt.
BTW, he's in the best most heart-breaking scene in The Sopranos.
It doesn't take long to figure out that knowledge on the web is mostly rebranding of what's on Wikipedia. Once a lie shows up on a Wikipedia page, it becomes fact.
